nodes.text: Palso Thern was a human male who served as a B-wing pilot in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. In 4 ABY, he attended the briefing during which Chancellor Mon Mothma discussed the plan to attack the Galactic Empire's second Death Star battle station over the Forest Moon of Endor. During the briefing he stood beside Keyan Farlander and other fellow pilots.

Palso Thern first appeared as a Rebel pilot during the briefing on Home One in 1983's Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. He was portrayed by an uncredited extra. He was eventually identified and given an action figure in the "Battle Over Endor" set of 2010's Star Wars: The Vintage Collection, as part of Star Wars Legends. He was first identified in the canon continuity in 2020's Star Wars: Starfighter Missions mobile game.
